about.title: Who am I?
about.description: As a creative developer, I'm not just focused on code. What sets me apart is my ability to generate original ideas, conduct user-centered research, and actively involve the audience in the design process all to create meaningful and impactful digital products.

ambitions.title: My Vision & Drive
ambitions.developerText: I find joy in bringing my ideas to life not just as functional products, but as tools that truly help people. For me, development is a way to turn imagination into impact.
ambitions.beyondText: Beyond development, I’m deeply interested in design and the business side of technology. I enjoy thinking not only about how things work, but also why they matter and how they fit into a bigger picture.

skills.title: My Skills
skills.codingText: I have experience with JavaScript, React, React Native, Expo Go, Node.js, HTML, CSS, and Tailwind. I also have knowledge of APIs and AI integrations.
skills.entrepreneurshipText: I love pitching, thinking from a user’s perspective, and applying agile methods like Scrum. Leadership and team alignment are my strengths.
skills.researchText: I'm passionate about creating impact through sustainable design, gamification, and target group research that truly matters.
